author: markekraus
body:
This issue is to track limitations of PowerShell Core 6.0.0 on the macOS platform. Limitations being defined as features that are already included in pwsh but either do not work at all or work partially on macOS (probably due to CoreFX limitations). 

* [ ] Web Cmdlet Client Certificate Authentication Support #4650
* [ ] Web Cmdlet Multiple `-SslProtocol` Support #5329 

Please update with more if you are aware of them.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @markekraus great idea, can you copy this content to https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4734 where we can track in one place?

title: macOS Limitations in 6.0.0
